item.title: Bitcoin Price Continues Medium-Term Decline
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Continues Medium-Term Decline

Bitcoin price slipped over the edge during weekend trade. Analysis looks at the basic chart indications and potential decline targets. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member? Join now.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Trend Line Proved Worth - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Trend Line Proved Worth - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price after tumbling started to correct higher against the US Dollar, but I think the correction phase won't last long. Ethereum price after tumbling started to correct higher against the US Dollar, but I think the correction phase won't last long.

item.title: How Can I earn free Bitcoin online?
item.description:
How Can I earn free Bitcoin online?

The best thing that has happened to me as a result of being nice is, that I can stand before every one today, nearing my ripe old age as I indubitably am, and be absolutely delighted that the 'niceness' I found within me to impart on others, has come back ten-fold to me, through my life.

item.title: What are Bitcoin and Bitcoin mining?
item.description:
What are Bitcoin and Bitcoin mining?

Answer: Bitcoin with a capital B is a distributed enterprise with world wide participants most of whom are linked across the internet to provide for the generation and exchange of tokens which are recognized as having value. The tokens are generally referred to as bitcoin, with a lower-case b. Th...

item.title: Brazilian Institute BVRio To Use Ethereum's Ledger Against Illegal Timber Trading
item.description:
Brazilian Institute BVRio To Use Ethereum's Ledger Against Illegal Timber Trading

BVRio, a Brazilian organization promoting green markets, together with ConsenSys (a venture production studio focused on Ethereum Dapps), announced a partnership to use Regis, a distributed application running on top of Ethereum as a secure ledger.

item.title: Steve Manos Learns How Not to Exchange Bitcoin, the Hard Way - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Steve Manos Learns How Not to Exchange Bitcoin, the Hard Way - NEWSBTC

Steve Manos, a Florida resident was robbed of his money while trying to exchange it for Bitcoin in a parking lot. Read more... What happens when someone wants to buy digital currency in a 'not so digital' fashion? They may get ripped off. At least that's what happened to this man in Palm Beach, Florida.

item.title: How anonymous are bitcoins if I have to buy the bitcoins with something?
item.description:
How anonymous are bitcoins if I have to buy the bitcoins with something?

When I was a kid it was rude, but still commonplace, for some white people to address adult black men as "boy." When black men objected, the whites who did this called it political correctness. They lost. Try that now and you stand a good chance of losing your job.

item.title: Russian Ambitions, Ethereum Classic Ascending, and The Dark Side of Bitcoin. Cryptospace News, July 25 - 31
item.description:
Russian Ambitions, Ethereum Classic Ascending, and The Dark Side of Bitcoin. Cryptospace News, July 25 - 31

Bitcoin price going down once again, Ethereum Classic media bomb exploding, GreenAddress purchased by BlockStream, yet another news from Coinbase, and somewhat optimistic statements heard from Russia's technological market - all in ForkLog's weekly overview. Cryptocurrency number one, contrary to the expectations that its price will inevitably grow after the halving, continued slightly plunging for the second week in a row.

item.title: Industry Report: No Bitcoin Crime Goes Unpunished
item.description:
Industry Report: No Bitcoin Crime Goes Unpunished

A bitcoin buyer is robbed, the latest game to pay in digital currency, and new initiatives for fighting ransomware are set forth. Want to catch up on your latest digital currency news? Take a look below. Also read: Industry Report: Bitcoin Fraud Never Works A bitcoin buyer has undergone quite a scare after being robbed at knifepoint.

item.title: How the Great Schism Can End Badly for Both Ethereum Chains (Part 3 of 3)
item.description:
How the Great Schism Can End Badly for Both Ethereum Chains (Part 3 of 3)

Ethereum Classic is dominating the cryptocurrency news cycle. After a slumber of some days following the Ethereum hard fork that refunded investors of the raided DAO, the unforked and re-named Ethereum blockchain and its native token classic ether (ETC) surged.
